issue.title: [Release] Website release notes count not strictly release associated patches
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8849](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8849). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For example in the 0.17.1 release notes show 27 commits while the jira release only contains 19 patches. This is because the release specific commits (like the versions bumbs) are also accumulated.

See the patch release notes here https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/59/files
